description: A vulnerability classified as problematic was found in Campcodes Complete Web-Based School Management System 1.0. Affected by this vulnerability is an unknown functionality of the file /view/conversation_history_admin.php. The manipulation of the argument conversation_id leads to cross site scripting. The attack can be launched remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. The identifier VDB-263629 was assigned to this vulnerability.
